column4: that is a bit off topic, but does anyone know if the service tag on a dell pc is machine or model specific?
when I was lad, service tags were machine specific, so you couldn't just insure one machine and then swap the innards around when the others break. They're on to that...
would it be possible to track a machine with its service tag? (just a thought)
depends what you mean by 'track'. By whom? For what? Tracked how?
